objects.description: " [YiSpecter](https://attack.mitre.org/software/MOB-S0027)'s malicious apps were signed with three iOS enterprise certificates issued by Apple so that they can be installed as enterprise apps on non-jailbroken iOS devices."

external_references.description: [ Claud Xiao. (2015, October 4). YiSpecter: First iOS Malware That Attacks Non-jailbroken Apple iOS Devices by Abusing Private APIs. Retrieved January 20, 2017.
